cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 → c0 ∈ c2)
⊣ c1 =(LHyp ` c3)
⊣ c2 =(Base ` c3)

comment: A co-atom is a member of the lattice base set (i.e., a lattice element). (Contributed by NM, 18-May-2012.)
